name: Unbreak my Heart!!
description:
In this digital visual novel, play as a transfer student who works to repair the relationships of quirky couples around Westview High School. This game was created in 48 hours for the Austin Global Game Jam 2020. Thanks for playing!

All of the creators worked collaboratively in art, programming, debugging, and writing.

  • Jiaxin Huang
  • Micah Chow
  • Sarah Cheng
  • Julio Aldana
  • Patrick Rall
  • Levi Walker
  • Soo Aguilar
  • Xiaowen Huang
